entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 02:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 02:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
